EmailTemplate.subject: You are on the waiting list for NCS
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
NCS powered by The Challenge
NCSTHECHALLENGE.ORG
{!Contact.FirstName} is on the waiting list for NCS
Dear {!IF(Contact.Parent_Name__c <> ""," "& ( Contact.Parent_Name__c ) &" ","Parent or Guardian")},
Thank you for {!Contact.Name}’s application for NCS. It’s a popular programme so {!Contact.Name} is on the waiting list at the moment. However, they still have a good chance of getting a place.
How can you increase {!Contact.Name}’s chances of getting a place? Simply log in to select other suitable programme dates. The more dates you add, the greater {!Contact.Name}’s chances of taking part in NCS. If you are happy for {!Contact.Name} to travel to a programme which is further away and may have places available, please select this option when adding extra dates online. When will you find out more? We will call you if a place becomes available. Places can become available at any time, right up to the programme start date.
In the meantime, if you have any questions, you can get in touch with us using the contact details below.
We hope to be able to offer {!Contact.Name} a place soon. Please remember that the more dates you choose, the greater {!Contact.Name}’s chances of getting a place.
The NCS Team - The Challenge
Phone: 0203 542 2400 Email: contact@ncsthechallenge.org Our opening hours are 9am - 7pm Monday to Friday and 9am - 3pm on Saturdays and Sundays.
